name: I want to be buried in slime!
name_original: I want to be buried in slime!
description:
I want to be buried in slime―――.
This work was born from such a dream.
The rules are simple and clear!
Overcome the obstacles that stand in your way
and reach the slime!
Are you confident in your character movement?
Want to try your hand at character movement?
Let's go!

You control the player from the FPS perspective with mouse and keyboard.
You get a score by touching the slime, and clear the stage by getting a score more than the specified amount within the time limit.
After clearing a stage, you can challenge yourself to clear it in a shorter time or get more score within the time limit.

[Enjoy the exhilarating action!]
You can jump in the air.
Gimmicks such as a high jump platform and a warp gate are also included.
Use them to clear the stage!

[Functions useful for Time Attack]
A function to display the high score, minimum clear time, number of times cleared, and number of times challenged for each stage.
One-tap keyboard keyboard key to immediately restart the stage (key bindings can be changed).
